entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: A leading technology company responsible for various products and services, including LinkedIn, GitHub, Microsoft Advertising, MSN, and Xbox.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: A professional networking platform owned by Microsoft, containing valuable information and content protected by contractual restrictions or technical measures.

entities.name: GITHUB
entities.description: A platform owned by Microsoft that hosts code repositories and allows for collaboration among developers.

entities.name: MICROSOFT ADVERTISING
entities.description: An advertising platform managed by Microsoft.

entities.name: MSN
entities.description: An internet portal and related collection of Internet services and apps for Windows and mobile devices, provided by Microsoft.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: A gaming brand created and owned by Microsoft.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft owns LinkedIn and is responsible for its content and user data.
Microsoft owns GitHub and manages its platform and user data.
Microsoft manages the Microsoft Advertising platform.
Microsoft provides and manages the MSN internet services and apps.
Microsoft is the creator and owner of the Xbox gaming brand.
